requirements: Prerequisite: IBIO 531 or a similar course that provides a solid foundation in fundamental immunology; may be waived for highly motivated students.
description:
This seminar covers principles of human diseases caused by defects in immune defenses (immunodeficiency) or self-tolerance (autoimmunity). Emphasis is placed on understanding mechanisms of disease and therapeutic interventions.
Prerequisite: IBIO 531 or a similar course that provides a solid foundation in fundamental immunology; may be waived for highly motivated students.
title: CANCELLED
